name: The Master's Quest
description:
NOTE: This game contains some harsh language and pixelated gore. So don't let the kids play this.

The Master's Quest is a simple RPG for your Game  emulator or web browser. (Except Microsoft Edge, in which case I will personally take your computer away from you.)

In it, explore a strange, post-apocalyptic world to find and destroy the seven artifacts in seven different temples because you were told to do it! So do it!

You also get to:

  • Press the A button to interact with objects! Many have hilarious flavor texts that you may/may not find funny!
  • Be a protagonist that swears edgily (?) sometimes! This is quite possibly the first Game <redacted> game with such a feat!
  • Find unique game design tropes not found anywhere else! Dark rooms with walls you can't see could ruin your day! Not found anywhere else for a reason!
  • Sigh in relief that this is not one of those "long" RPGs!
  • Extract every bit of enjoyment from this game by exploring two (2) side areas! One of them has a puzzle!
  • Really feel like The Master's Quest!

Made with GB studio, and with the GB Studio Community Assets compiled by DeerTears for music, as well as the Text-Input System for GB Studio by TOXWORKS.
